title: Headhunter akali
body: Just curious, anyone know when headhunter akali is coming out? As an impatient akali main i really wana buy this skin already -_-

replies.body:
Headhunter Akali is now available!

She's 1350 RP, but discounted to 975 RP for a bit. :]
Just curious why anyone would play Akali considering recent nerf didn't just make her worse but ruined her entire play style and made it clunky and awkward by removing q proc on e.
